The 4th Be With You

This site is a showcase of the work and projects that I’ve done over the years, and also serves as a jump off point for my musings and reflections.

This latest incarnation (the 4th) is the result of flexing my creative and technical ego, taking a break from client and corporate work, and geeking out over a month.

So what makes this site tick huh?

I built this website on top of Jekyll, a static site compiler powered by the Liquid templating engine. It’s hosted on Github Pages.

I handcoded the template and static database myself. You can find find the source on Github: https://github.com/emsky/emsky.github.io

Handcrafted, mobile-first, with love

Staying true to my process, I disrupted my own UI workflow by using Adobe Comp to create the low-fi wireframes instead of sketching them out on my Rocketbook, and converting them using Sketch.

With Adobe Comp on my iPad Pro, I was able to combine the sketching and wireframing steps into one. I hope I can use this in future projects!

I’m looking for a full-time UX and product designer position, worldwide. I’m also looking to connect with fellow designers and am open to speaking opportunities. Let’s grab a coffee or two, and chat if you’re in Makati!
